name: I Wanna Be the Immaculate Scumble
name_original: I Wanna Be the Immaculate Scumble
description:
A simplistic tritone-colored world, first conquered by four champions. Now it is your chance to Immaculate the Scumble (or whatever). 

This was the Blind Needle Race game for Fangame Marathon 2021. It is a tribute game to the 2016 cult classic needle game, I wanna be the Magnificent Stumble, created by Hiddow. It was worked on by many wonderful creators. We hope you enjoy it.

Creators: 

Artimax, Chatran, cLOUDDEAD, Cthaere, IanBoy141, Kiyoshi, Nearigami, 

popop614, shign, Skulldude, SuperSheep, Synthasmagoria, 

very cool, xoro1, YaBoiMarcAntony

If you are here from Panasonic Bluray, please note that this game is not intended for beginners. This game is very difficult.

Here is the soundtrack.

This game contains music and assets that are not mine. This game is and always will be 100% free.
